author: AFP
title: China pauses in memory of virus victims and ‘martyrs’
description: In Wuhan, sirens sounded as people fall silent in the streets
content:
China came to a standstill on Saturday to mourn patients and medical staff killed by the coronavirus, as the worlds most populous country observed a nationwide three-minute silence.
Also read:Coronavirus | China sees drop in imported cases
